summary: This is an email chain between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel and a contractor, discussing civil lawsuits filed by the law firm Boies Schiller against Jeffrey Epstein's estate. The email indicates the suits were filed the previous day (November 12, 2019).

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Mentioned by a contractor as the person who asked that civil suits filed by Boies Schiller against Epstein's estate be passed along to USANYS recipients.

events.title: Boies Schiller files civil suits against Epstein estate
events.description: The law firm Boies Schiller files civil lawsuits against the estate of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Civil lawsuits were filed by the law firm Boies Schiller against Jeffrey Epstein's estate on or about November 12, 2019.
The email communication is between personnel at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) and a contractor.
A person named Geoff requested that the civil suit documents be passed along to USANYS recipients.
The document is an internal government email discussing ongoing civil litigation related to the Epstein case.
